Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.FXMLControllers

Class FXMLAllCardsController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.FXMLControllers.FXMLAllCardsController
public class FXMLAllCardsController
extends java.lang.Object
this controller manages the event of the challenger to choose the number of cards in order to the number of players in game, cards are selected between the 14 gods of the game
